body.doorbell: Choose if you want to copy the signal from your doorbell or if you want to generate a new signal to pair your doorbell with.
body.codewheel_switch: Choose if you want to copy an existing signal from a paired remote or if you want manually set the codewheels to pair this device.�

body.old_blinds: Press the up/down button that is paired to your blinds.
body.socket:
Press the button that is paired to your socket.

(Note. Homey only supports transmitters of which the product code starts with an A. If you use an old remote for this device please let Homey generate a new signal for the device)
body.blinds:
Press the up/down button that is paired to your blinds.

(Note. For this device Homey only supports transmitters of which the product code starts with an A. If you use an old remote for this device please let Homey generate a new signal for the device)
body.AFR-100: Press the button that is paired to your fitting.
body.build_in: Press the button that is paired to your device.
body.sensor: Trigger your sensor manually or toggle the learn switch to DEL and then back to SET.
body.ALED-2709: Press the button that is paired to your lamp.
body.AMST-606: Connect and then disconnect the two parts of your sensor.

body.blinds: Use the buttons above to test your blinds. Press next to continue.
body.socket: Use the switch above to test your socket. Press next to continue.�
body.AFR-100: Use the switch above to test your fitting. Press next to continue.
body.build_in: Use the switch above to test your device. Press next to continue.
body.ALED-2709: Use the switch above to test your lamp. Press next to continue.

body.socket:
Press the program button on your socket, the light on your socket should start blinking when you release the button. When it is in pairing mode click next.

(Note. If you experience difficulties pairing try to reset your device by holding the program button for 10 seconds when it is blinking and then pressing the program button once.)
body.AFR-100:
Press the program button on your fitting, the light on your fitting should start blinking when you release the button. When it is in pairing mode click next.

(Note. If you experience difficulties pairing try to reset your device by holding the program button for 10 seconds when it is blinking and then pressing the program button once.)
body.build_in:
Press the program button on your device to put it in pairing mode, then click next.

(Note. If you experience difficulties pairing try to reset your device by holding the program button for 10 seconds when it is blinking and then pressing the program button once.)
body.simple_socket:
Unplug the socket for a couple of seconds and plug it back in, the light should now be blinking. When it is in pairing mode click next.

(Note. If you experience diffuculties pairing try to reset your device by putting it in pairing mode and holding the group button on the remote for 5 seconds. All addresses should now be cleared from the socket.)
body.ALED-003: Remove the one battery from the lamp and insert it again to put it in pairing mode. The light should now slowly blink. Then click next.
body.ALED-2709: Turn the power to the light on and off 3 times, or turn the light on and off with your remote 5 times, within 15 seconds to put the lamp in pairing mode. The lamp should now be blinking. Then click next.

title.build_in: Put the device in pairing mode

body.doorbell: Use the button above to test your doorbell. Press next to continue.
